General.Name: Western Alaska Minerals Corp
General.Description: Western Alaska Minerals Corp. engages in the acquiring, exploring, and developing mineral properties in the United States. The company primarily explores for gold, silver, copper, lead, and zinc deposits. It holds a 100% interest in the Round Top Property that consists of 92 state mineral claims located in the Mount McKinley and Nulato mining districts of Alaska; the Honker Property that consists of 24 state mineral claims located in the Mount McKinley mining district of Alaska; and the Illinois Creek Mine Project covering a total area of approximately 73,000 acres located in Alaska. The company was incorporated in 2020 and is headquartered in Tucson, Arizona.
General.Address: 3573 East Sunrise Drive, Tucson, AZ, United States, 85718
